StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary:
8 years of experience in IT industry with design, development and implementation of inter/intranet & Client/Server based software applications using Microsoft technologies.
• Expertise skills in Development using VB.NET, C#, Java Script, HTML, CSS, Ajax, Visual Source safe, IIS (Web Server), Windows/Web Application. • Experienced in SQL Server 2008/2012, designing Database/Tables, creating Login/Schema, developing Procedures/Triggers/ Views, Backup/Restore and export/import.

PositionHistory.Description:
Description- E-District Application is an internet web Application is developed using the .NET technologies from Microsoft. E-District Application is a Common web Platform that provides 24x7 hour Citizen centric services of the Government for convenient, effective, and Citizen friendly.
Roles and Responsibilities- • Developed the front end using C#.Net, HTML/DHTML, SOAP, JavaScript and Ajax was used for client side validation. • Designed and developed the database and wrote stored procedures for SQL Server 2008. • Developed the web services and window services using VB.Net and C#. • Developed reports using Microsoft SQL Server Reporting Services.
Environment: Microsoft .NET 4.0, IIS 7.0, MS SQL Server 2008 and Windows Server 2008.
6. Experience

PositionHistory.Title: Application Engineer
PositionHistory.Description: PROJECT-1 Project Name: Bangalore One Languages: VB.Net and C#.Net Team Size: 25

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 100% of this job

PositionHistory.Description:
one is an Internet as well as intranet web Application developed using .NET technologies from Microsoft. Bangalore One provides 24x7 hour Citizen centric services of the Government and Private businesses. Bangalore One also provides online services to citizens through the website http://www.bangaloreone.gov.in.
Roles and Responsibilities- • Designed and developed the services based on functional requirements given by Respective Departments / Organizations. • Developed the front end using ASP.Net, HTML SOAP, Ajax and JavaScript was used for client side validation. • Developed the web services and window services using VB.Net and C#. Environment: Developed in Microsoft Technologies .NET 3.5, SQL Server 2008, IIS 7.0, Visual SourceSafe, Windows Server 2008.
Date:- Place: - Hyderabad V.Ramarao Yenigalla

NonXMLResume.TextResume:
Venkata Ramarao Yenigalla Email: ramarao.yenigalla@gmail.com Phone: +91-9848519607
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
8 years of experience in IT industry with design, development and implementation of inter/intranet & Client/Server based software applications using Microsoft technologies.
• Expertise skills in Development using VB.NET, C#, Java Script, HTML, CSS, Ajax, Visual Source safe, IIS (Web Server), Windows/Web Application. • Experienced in SQL Server 2008/2012, designing Database/Tables, creating Login/Schema, developing Procedures/Triggers/ Views, Backup/Restore and export/import.
Education
• B Tech(CSE) from Regency Institute of Technology - Pondicherry University (2005-2009)[7.12 CGPA]
1. Experience
• Organization: "Gamyam Technologies Pvt Ltd.", Hyderabad, INDIA • Designation: "Senior IT Consultant" • Duration: January-2018 to Till Date
PROJECT -1
Project Name: Telangana State Road Transport Corporation Languages: C#.Net Duration: January 2018 to Till Date
Roles and Responsibilities- • Conducting research, analysis and financial modeling for client's engagements. • Developing selection criteria for software engineers. • Providing technical support and training to a team. • Monitoring and supervising projects. • Analyzing technical data and installing various software products. • Reporting to the managing director on daily activities of the team. 2. Experience
• Organization: "Voyager Global Informatics Pvt Ltd.", Hyderabad, INDIA • Designation: "Senior Technical Consultant" • Duration: April-2016 to December-2017
3. Experience
• Organization: "Nihar Info Global Ltd.", Hyderabad, INDIA • Designation: "Senior Software Engineer" • Duration: July-2015 to March-2016
PROJECT -1
Project Name: GoldnSilver.in (Windows Mobile App) Languages: C#.Net Duration: July-2015 to April -2016
4. Experience
• Organization: "Voyager Global Informatics Pvt Ltd.", Hyderabad, INDIA • Designation: "Technical Consultant" • Duration: November-2013 to June-2015
PROJECT -1
Project Name: Road Transport Corporation Bus Pass System Languages: VB.Net and C#.Net Duration: November 2013 to June 2015 Client: Road Transport Corporation
Description-
• Sale of all types of Bus passes Applications to Students, NGOs, and PHCs etc. • Issue of online MR (Money Receipt). • Online Photo grabbing. • Reports / MIS as per the requirement of RTC.
Roles and Responsibilities- • Developed the front end using C#.Net, HTML, SOAP, JavaScript and Ajax. • Designed and developed the database and stored procedures for SQL Server. • Developed reports using Microsoft SQL Server Reporting Services.
Environment: Microsoft .NET 4.0, IIS 7.0, MS SQL Server 2008 and Windows Server 2008. 5. Experience
• Organization: "Techno Brain India Pvt Ltd.", Hyderabad, INDIA • Designation: "Software Engineer" • Duration: January-2013 to October-2013
PROJECT-1
Project Name: e-District Languages: VB.Net and C#.Net Team Size: 10
Duration: January 2013 to October 2013 Client: Govt of Andhra Pradesh
Description-
E-District Application is an internet web Application is developed using the .NET technologies from Microsoft. E-District Application is a Common web Platform that provides 24x7 hour Citizen centric services of the Government for convenient, effective, and Citizen friendly.
Roles and Responsibilities- • Developed the front end using C#.Net, HTML/DHTML, SOAP, JavaScript and Ajax was used for client side validation. • Designed and developed the database and wrote stored procedures for SQL Server 2008. • Developed the web services and window services using VB.Net and C#. • Developed reports using Microsoft SQL Server Reporting Services.
Environment: Microsoft .NET 4.0, IIS 7.0, MS SQL Server 2008 and Windows Server 2008.
6. Experience
• Organization: "Ram Informatics, Ltd.", Bangalore, INDIA • Designation: "Application Engineer" • Duration: September-2011 to December-2012
PROJECT-1
Project Name: Bangalore One Languages: VB.Net and C#.Net Team Size: 25
Duration: September 2011 to December 2012 Client: Govt of Karnataka
Description-
Bangalore one is an Internet as well as intranet web Application developed using .NET technologies from Microsoft. Bangalore One provides 24x7 hour Citizen centric services of the Government and Private businesses. Bangalore One also provides online services to citizens through the website http://www.bangaloreone.gov.in.
Roles and Responsibilities- • Designed and developed the services based on functional requirements given by Respective Departments / Organizations. • Developed the front end using ASP.Net, HTML SOAP, Ajax and JavaScript was used for client side validation. • Developed the web services and window services using VB.Net and C#. Environment: Developed in Microsoft Technologies .NET 3.5, SQL Server 2008, IIS 7.0, Visual SourceSafe, Windows Server 2008.
Date:- Place: - Hyderabad V.Ramarao Yenigalla

sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:Description: Venkata Ramarao Yenigalla's experience appears to be strongly concentrated in Information Technology (mostly Programming) and slightly concentrated in Common End-user Software (mostly Operating Systems). Venkata Ramarao Yenigalla has 8 years of work experience.

sov:Findings.sov:Information: [Sovren:213;] A street level address was not found in the contact information. A full contact address should always be included in a resume as it allows for location based searches.
